import React from "react"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { yupResolver } from "@hookform/resolvers/yup"; import * as yup from "yup"; import { StyledForm } from "./styles/Form.styled"; function Form({errors,register}) { return ( <>

{errors.receiverName?.type === "required" && "Alıcı adı gerekli!"}

{errors.currentCode && "Cari kod gerekli!"}

{errors.deliveryCode && "Teslim için Özel Kod gerekli!"}

); } export default Form;
